Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
-- The program is called for:
-- 1: Modifications --> PI.Button New Note pressed ='TRUE', the User()
is able to create new notes for the actual date or to modify
his own notes for the actual date
-- 2: QUERY --> PI.Button New Note pressed ='FASLE', only QUERY is
allowed
20.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
15.10.2012 SH SCR17574 Changed Blob Ansi to Unicode blob (INRM)
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
21.10.2003 JJ SCR4588 Modified copy of ODHC05 for use as OSP108
14.08.2003 RR -> SCR3193 Implemented shortcut-handling
22.05.2002 SH Removed --> TRIM if Blob-Field read from table or stored to table,
- otherwise the textformat lost
-- If all text was deleted by USER, the according row in table
-- DEBTOR_HELLER_REMARK will be deleted
-- Shortcut labels
-- Shortcut handling
-- If DHRM_NOTICE will be cleared by USER, the according row
-- out of table DEBTOR_HELLER_REMARKS will be deleted
-- Close program ODHC05_003
-- If DHRM_NOTICE will be cleared by USER, the according row
-- out of table DEBTOR_HELLER_REMARKS will be deleted

ExpSyntax.val: Trim ({0,3})='' OR Trim ({0,3})=User (0) AND ({0,2}=Date () OR ISNULL ({0,2})) AND {1,4}
